Text:
Could someone please explain how someone 'seeds' a file after downloading it. I'm happy to do this from now on on my downloads but i dont quite understand how. 

(i currently use shareaza for my torrent downloads if that matters)

thx
Thanks for this Dino.RIC34994359 to seed just download file again and it will check the exsisting file and keep running and you are a seeder.
